general.title: Comply with Norwegian UU law
general.notes: Forskrift om universell utforming av IKT-løsninger (lovpålagt i Norge)

general.title: Support light & dark modes with accessible contrast
general.notes: Respect system preference; ensure focus states visible

general.title: Don't rely on color alone
general.notes: Use text, shapes, or icons in addition to color

semantic_structure.title: One <h1>; per page; logical heading order
semantic_structure.notes: Avoid skipping heading levels without reason

semantic_structure.title: Use proper list markup
semantic_structure.notes: Use <ul>, <ol>, <li> for lists; not divs with bullets

semantic_structure.title: Table headers and scope
semantic_structure.notes: Use <th> with proper scope; associate data cells with headers

semantic_structure.title: Document structure and outline
semantic_structure.notes: Logical content hierarchy; use sections and articles appropriately

keyboard_focus.title: All functionality is keyboard accessible
keyboard_focus.notes: Tab order matches visual order; no traps

keyboard_focus.title: Manage focus in dialogs and overlays
keyboard_focus.notes: Trap focus and return to trigger on close

keyboard_focus.title: Skip links and landmark nav
keyboard_focus.notes: Provide a 'Skip to content' link at page start

keyboard_focus.title: Keyboard shortcuts and hotkeys
keyboard_focus.notes: Document and provide alternatives for custom shortcuts

keyboard_focus.title: Escape key functionality
keyboard_focus.notes: Escape closes modals, dropdowns, and overlays

keyboard_focus.title: Arrow key navigation
keyboard_focus.notes: Support arrow keys in menus, grids, and custom components

aria.title: Use ARIA sparingly—native first
aria.notes: Add ARIA only when native semantics are insufficient

aria.title: Apply correct ARIA patterns
aria.notes: ARIA Authoring Practices for tabs, menus, accordions

aria.title: Avoid invalid roles/states
aria.notes: Validate roles and relationships; no duplicate IDs

forms_validation.title: Every input has a label
forms_validation.notes: Link with for or aria-labelledby; placeholders aren't labels

forms_validation.title: Logical tab order & input help
forms_validation.notes: Provide inline hints; preserve input on error

forms_validation.title: Touch target size
forms_validation.notes: Minimum ~44px area; adequate spacing between controls

forms_validation.title: Input types and constraints
forms_validation.notes: Use appropriate input types (email, tel, url, etc.) with validation

forms_validation.title: Form submission feedback
forms_validation.notes: Confirm successful submission; announce errors clearly

color_contrast_motion.title: Text contrast meets WCAG
color_contrast_motion.notes: 4.5:1 for normal text; 3:1 for large text (≥18.66px regular or 14px bold)

color_contrast_motion.title: Avoid flashing content
color_contrast_motion.notes: No more than 3 flashes per second

color_contrast_motion.title: Accessible focus in both themes
color_contrast_motion.notes: Ensure focus states pass contrast in light/dark

responsive_mobile.title: Relative units for typography
responsive_mobile.notes: Use rem/em; avoid hard px for text

responsive_mobile.title: Adequate spacing between touch targets
responsive_mobile.notes: At least ~8px gap between tappable elements

responsive_mobile.title: Orientation and reflow
responsive_mobile.notes: Support both orientations; content reflows gracefully

media_content.title: Provide captions and transcripts
media_content.notes: Synchronized captions for video; transcripts for audio

media_content.title: Audio descriptions or alternatives
media_content.notes: Describe key visual info in videos when needed

media_content.title: Control autoplay
media_content.notes: Avoid autoplay; if used, provide pause/stop/mute

media_content.title: Time limits & moving content
media_content.notes: Allow users to extend time; pause moving/scrolling content

testing_ci.title: Run automated a11y checks
testing_ci.notes: axe, Lighthouse, Pa11y, WAVE in CI

testing_ci.title: Track & fail on critical issues
testing_ci.notes: A11y budgets; break the build for regressions

workflow_governance.title: Add a11y acceptance criteria to stories
workflow_governance.notes: Definition of Done includes a11y checks

workflow_governance.title: Create PR templates with a11y checklist
workflow_governance.notes: Include keyboard, labels, contrast, SR announcements

workflow_governance.title: Design system documentation
workflow_governance.notes: Token contrast, ARIA patterns, examples, do/don’t

workflow_governance.title: Test with users with disabilities
workflow_governance.notes: Include diverse users in research & usability tests

mindset.title: Accessibility as a feature
mindset.notes: Plan, budget, and prioritize—not a bolt-on fix

mindset.title: Shift left
mindset.notes: Catch issues in design and component stage

mindset.title: Small, continuous improvements
mindset.notes: Prevent a11y debt; iterate with telemetry & tests

mindset.title: Educate the team
mindset.notes: WAI Tutorials for ongoing learning

mindset.title: Document decisions
mindset.notes: Explain tradeoffs and rationale for patterns

screen_readers.title: Screen reader navigation
screen_readers.notes: Test heading navigation, landmark navigation, and link navigation

screen_readers.title: Announcements and live regions
screen_readers.notes: Ensure important updates are announced appropriately

screen_readers.title: Screen reader only content
screen_readers.notes: Use .sr-only class for screen reader only text when needed

screen_readers.title: Alternative text for complex images
screen_readers.notes: Provide detailed descriptions for charts, graphs, and diagrams

cognitive_accessibility.title: Clear and simple language
cognitive_accessibility.notes: Use plain language; avoid jargon and complex sentences

cognitive_accessibility.title: Consistent navigation and layout
cognitive_accessibility.notes: Maintain consistent patterns throughout the application

cognitive_accessibility.title: Error prevention and recovery
cognitive_accessibility.notes: Prevent errors where possible; provide clear recovery options

cognitive_accessibility.title: Help and documentation
cognitive_accessibility.notes: Provide contextual help and clear instructions

cognitive_accessibility.title: Time limits and interruptions
cognitive_accessibility.notes: Allow users to extend time limits; warn before timeouts

performance_accessibility.title: Fast loading times
performance_accessibility.notes: Optimize for slow connections; consider users with limited bandwidth

performance_accessibility.title: Efficient resource usage
performance_accessibility.notes: Minimize memory usage; avoid excessive JavaScript

performance_accessibility.title: Progressive loading
performance_accessibility.notes: Load critical content first; lazy load non-essential features

performance_accessibility.title: Offline functionality
performance_accessibility.notes: Provide basic functionality when offline when possible

internationalization.title: RTL language support
internationalization.notes: Support right-to-left languages with proper CSS and markup

internationalization.title: Text expansion
internationalization.notes: Design for text that may be longer in other languages

internationalization.title: Cultural considerations
internationalization.notes: Consider cultural differences in color meanings and symbols

internationalization.title: Font and character support
internationalization.notes: Ensure fonts support all required characters and scripts
